import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get reload operation status"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/reload"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the current status of the reload operation. Use this to monitor background reload progress.

The status endpoint provides visibility into:
- Whether a reload is currently in progress
- Success or failure of the last reload operation
- Number of signer loading errors encountered (if any)
- Timestamp of the last operation


<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Current reload status","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["status"],"properties":{"status":{"type":"string","enum":["idle","running","completed","completed_with_errors","failed"],"description":"Current status of reload operation:\n- `idle`: No reload has been triggered yet, or system just started\n- `running`: Reload operation is currently in progress\n- `completed`: Last reload completed successfully with no errors\n- `completed_with_errors`: Last reload completed but some signer configurations failed to load\n- `failed`: Last reload failed due to infrastructure error (e.g., executor shutdown)\n"},"lastOperationTime":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp of last reload operation start/completion (ISO-8601 format). Absent if no reload has been triggered yet."},"lastError":{"type":"string","description":"Error or warning message from last reload operation. Present when:\n- `status` is `failed`: Contains infrastructure failure details\n- `status` is `completed_with_errors`: Contains count of signer loading failures\n\nAbsent when status is `idle`, `running`, or `completed`.\n"}}},"examples":{"idle":{"summary":"Initial state - no reload triggered yet","value":{"status":"idle"}},"running":{"summary":"Reload in progress","value":{"status":"running","lastOperationTime":"2025-12-10T10:30:00Z"}},"completed":{"summary":"Successful reload with no errors","value":{"status":"completed","lastOperationTime":"2025-12-10T10:30:15Z"}},"completed_with_errors":{"summary":"Reload completed but some signers failed to load","value":{"status":"completed_with_errors","lastOperationTime":"2025-12-10T10:30:12Z","lastError":"Reload completed with 3 signer loading error(s)"}},"failed":{"summary":"Reload failed due to infrastructure error","value":{"status":"failed","lastOperationTime":"2025-12-10T10:30:10Z","lastError":"Reload failed: Executor service unavailable"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
